description: Al Qaeda has six regional branches and affiliations with at least 14 other terrorist groups. All together, the organizations have operations in almost 30 countries.
title: Where Al Qaeda and Its Affiliates Operate
title_page: Where Al Qaeda and Its Affiliates Operate - Interactive Map - NYTimes.com
text:
Map of Countries Where Al Qaeda and Its Affiliates Operate
Al Qaeda has six regional branches and affiliations with at least 14 other terrorist groups. All together, the organizations have operations in almost 30 countries, according to research by IntelCenter, a Virginia-based organization that tracks terrorist groups.
